P

Pile - Class in proasg4
Maintains the pile, can tell the user how many marbles are left and can remove marbles
Pile() - Constructor for class proasg4.Pile
Creates a new pile of a random size between 10 - 100
pileAmt() - Method in class proasg4.Pile
The amount of marbles remaining
pileRemove(int) - Method in class proasg4.Pile
Removes a given amount of marbles from pile
play(Player, Player, String, String) - Method in class proasg4.Nim
initializes the game of nim with 2 players, either human or computer
Player - Interface in proasg4
Describes a class of human or computer to play nim
